Name: Highway Cross
About the game: The time has come when people need your environmental orientation skills. In this casual game, you will be the guide of several travelers who got lost and need to reach their desired destination. Unfortunately, you will not set a good example for others, but instead, you will help someone cross the street safely without being put at risk of being hit by a car. Everyone is counting on you, and take care that no one needs unpleasant news in the city. No car is coming? Let's run away! Game Features : - 15 levels - Heavy traffic - Several groups of tourists
